name: Untitled space game prototype
description:
A developement project me and a friend started that sadly hasn't made it past it's prototyping (for now) the general aim was to create a multiplayer spaceship battle arena but at the stage of the prototype the controls and movement where the majorityof the focus, as well as some visual affects (chromatic aberration) on my part.

all assets where made by me either in Blender or Grand designer. programming wise this is my version, we worked seperately and then pooled ideas and took those that we prefered and went and created the same script again individually putting our own take on what had previously been developed with the discussed feedback used as a basis, so this version is more or less my own, with small snippets of my friends code  in places perhaps.

Controls:

W/S- aceleration/deceleration 

A/D- strafe left/right

Q/E- roll

mouse  - pan up/down/left/right
